document.description: Examples of the lemma cool from the MASC project for FN annotation
document.name: cool

sentence.text: Jack was never flurried , his cool , unruffled play was a hallmark of his game , along with some immensely powerful clearances .
` If you want peace it is important to stay cool . "
To stay cool , for Christ 's sake !
Under pressure , when some horses tend to fall apart , Milton responds by jumping even better , while John stays cool and professional .
Ann keeps cool under fire in the front line
But somehow she has managed to remain cool and calm .

She surveyed his long-limbed body with an attempt at cool detachment , her gaze flickering over the dark denims that moulded his strong thighs , and the jade sweater that clung to his hard male chest .
She gave a cool little shrug and concentrated on the scenery outside the window .
Her answer was as cool as she could make it , with her head held high , even though holding it so steadily erect made her feel dizzy .
He 's cool , articulate and a slighter man than you might expect , a tennis player in a town of Schwarzeneggers .
He was rather cool with her , since drinking was n't much fun if he could n't stir it between the two women .
Kylie is cool and she is in control .
Morse shook hands with the three of them ; and noted with approval the firm , cool handshake of Howard Brown , whose eyes seemed to Morse equally firm and cool as he smiled a cautious greeting .
Rakovsky listened to the cool voice describing the intensive hypnosis and subliminal suggestion that would distort Br√ºckner 's mentality .

When it really got thick , when , um , it got to one point where him and sheriff fell out , and the sheriff , you know , he was n't really , I guess , evidently , let them tell it , he was the cool guy .
It contrasts with the cool dignity of Piero della Francesca in his Federigo da Montefeltro and wife Battista ( 1465 ) , portrayed against their Urbino landscape .
And Basinger , a cool customer , has never looked more comfortable with another actor , not even Alec Baldwin .
